assertions: Scheduled maintenance logs must be retained in the primary operations ledger for at least five years.
Scheduled maintenance logs may be deleted after one year regardless of audit status.

noise_request.source_claim: Scheduled maintenance logs must be stored in the primary operations ledger for a minimum of five years.

assertions: Battery thermal management systems should keep cell temperatures between 20°C and 40°C during standard operation.
Battery thermal management systems allow cell temperatures to rise above 60°C during standard operation.
Battery thermal management systems require active cooling when ambient temperatures exceed 35°C.

noise_request.source_claim: Battery thermal management systems must maintain cell temperatures between 20°C and 40°C during standard operation.

assertions: Incident response playbooks are reviewed quarterly and require security council approval.
Incident response playbooks can be reviewed annually without security council approval.

noise_request.source_claim: Incident response playbooks must be reviewed quarterly and re-approved by the security council.
